author: Jennifer Levitz
title: Florida Governor Proposes Raising Age Limit on Gun Purchases
text:
Florida’s Republican political leaders on Friday said they backed raising the minimum age for the purchase of all firearms to 21, a rare move toward gun restrictions in the state in the wake of a mass shooting by a teenager at a high school.
GOP Gov. Rick Scott and state lawmakers have come under intense pressure to toughen firearms restrictions after 17 people were killed in a school shooting in Parkland. Mr. Scott said he didn’t back the idea voiced by President Donald Trump that teachers be armed. Instead, he called for...
